admreg: Middle East and North Africa,Middle East and North Africa

abstracts.cdata!:
The project will decrease load shedding
            through a combination of system expansion, efficiency
            improvement, load management and price adjustments. This
            will be accomplished through the addition of 200 megawatts
            (MW) of capacity, by converting the existing gas turbines at
            Qom to a combined cycle plant; the construction of 400 - kV
            (kilovolt) substations and transmission line; distribution
            equipment; technical assistance and training activities; and
            price reform measures supported by the project.
